    • isContainerCollected

      protected boolean isContainerCollected​(com.estg.core.Container container)
      Checks if a specified Container has been collected already.
      Parameters:
      container - The Container to check.
      Returns:
      • True, if the Container has been collected already.
      • False, if the Container has not been collected already.

    • isContainerUsed

      protected boolean isContainerUsed​(com.estg.core.Container container)
      Checks if an empty Container is already used to substitute for a loaded Container.
      Parameters:
      container - The Container to check.
      Returns:
      • True, if the Container is already used.
      • False, if the Container is not used.

    • getLastMeasurement

      protected com.estg.core.Measurement getLastMeasurement​(com.estg.core.Container container)
      Get the last measurement inserted on the measurements array of a specified Container.
      Parameters:
      container - The Container to get the last measurement.
      Returns:
      • The last measurement of the Container if found.
      • Null If the Container has no measurements.

    • needsCollection

      protected boolean needsCollection​(com.estg.core.Container container)
      Checks if the Container to be collected needs to be collected, based on the type (Perishable food or if the Container is with 80% of its Capacity filled).
      Parameters:
      container - The Container to check if it needs to be collected.
      Returns:
      • True, if the Container need to be collected.
      • False, if the Container don't meet the requirements to be collected.

    • findAidBoxForContainer

      protected com.estg.core.AidBox findAidBoxForContainer​(com.estg.core.AidBox[] aidBoxes, com.estg.core.Container container)
      Finds the aid box that contains the specified Container.
      Parameters:
      aidBoxes - The array with all aid boxes.
      container - The Container to find the aid box for.
      Returns:
      AidBox The aid box that contains the specified Container. Null If the aid box was not found.

    • isAidBoxCollected

      protected boolean isAidBoxCollected​(com.estg.core.AidBox[] aidBoxesInRoute, com.estg.core.AidBox aidBox)
      Checks if the specified AidBox has already been collected in the given array of aid boxes.
      Parameters:
      aidBoxesInRoute - Array of aid boxes in the current route.
      aidBox - The aid box to check.
      Returns:
      True, if the aid box already is in the array of aid boxes in the route. False, if the aid box is not in the array of aid boxes in the route.

    • getVehicleCapacityForType

      protected Capacity getVehicleCapacityForType​(Capacity[] capacities, com.estg.core.ContainerType type)
      Get the vehicle capacity based on the type.
      Parameters:
      capacities - The array of capacities of the vehicle.
      type - The type to check if he as a capacity for.
      Returns:
      Capacity The capacity of the vehicle for the specified type. Null If the capacity was not found.

    • isVehicleFull

      protected boolean isVehicleFull​(Capacity[] capacities)
      Checks if the vehicle is full based on the capacities he had.
      Parameters:
      capacities - Array of the current capacities of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      True, if the vehicle is already full (All capacities are on 0). False, if the vehicle can still carry.

    • calculateTotalDistance

      protected double calculateTotalDistance​(com.estg.core.AidBox[] aidBoxes)
      Calculates the total distance covered by the given array of the aid boxes, for the last aid box the vehicle need's to return to the base so will calculate the distance to the base.
      Parameters:
      aidBoxes - The array of the aid boxes representing the route.
      Returns:
      double The total distance covered by the given array of the aid boxes.
